description:
Andromeda Shun enters the ring for the next match and overwhelms Unicorn Jabu with his Nebula Chain. The chain then suddenly warns of an enemy nearby.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: El guerrero que viene del infierno
Fênix, o guerreiro que voltou do inferno
Le guerrier qui venait de l`enfer
Phoenix! The Saint Who Saw Hell
フェニックス! 地獄を見た戦士
